DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study in couples and to evaluate the safety of personal lubricant products.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Evaluation of Personal Lubricant Product When Used by Couples in Home-use Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: Study to evaluate the safety of Class II personal lubricant devices.
DOC.criteria: Normal, healthy males and females >18 years of age In committed heterosexual relationship for >6months On acceptable method of birth control Pregnant or breastfeeding Allergy to product ingredients Irritation or infection in genital area Unstable or uncontrolled medical condition
